q_en: Send 1000 Leathers to the Main Warehouse for storage.

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Leather';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name 'Leather'

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM warehouse WHERE name = 'Main Warehouse';
steps.description: Retrieve the warehouse ID for the warehouse with the name 'Main Warehouse'

steps.sql: INSERT INTO warehouse_material (warehouse_id, material_id, total_number, left_number) VALUES ('1', '7', 1000, 1000);
steps.description: Insert 1000 units of Leather into the Main Warehouse

response:
Hey there! 🌟

I've got everything sorted out for you! Here's what I did behind the scenes:

| Action                                      | Description                                       |
|---------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------|
| Retrieve Material ID for 'Leather'         | Material ID: 7                                    |
| Retrieve Warehouse ID for 'Main Warehouse' | Warehouse ID: 1                                   |
| Insert 1000 units of Leather into Main Warehouse | Successfully added 1000 units of Leather to the Main Warehouse! 🎉 |

Your request to send 1000 units of Leather to the Main Warehouse has been completed! If you need any more assistance, feel free to ask. 😊
